title: LF support/duo
body:
looking for a duo to get some practice, fun and relaxing games.
If you don't rage,like the game,enjoy playing it and just be enjoyable to be around.
Pref have coms of some sort talking helps get through boring games and Qs
Im an adc main but i can play most roles well enough would like a support that can play other roles okish.
add me if you want to try
glhf
Doing this before i power climb back to D5 or higher

replies.body:
IGN: Lexhanatin
Rank: Silver 3

Can support decently through lane phase and team fights.

I can Play a good Morgana. And all the other lanes, but Jungle. 
IGN: SomeoneNerfMe
Gold 1
